keyMoments.title: Masira Pirates Claim Salvage Rights
keyMoments.description: The Masira Pirates arrive at the St. Briss wreckage and claim salvage rights over the sunken ship, introducing themselves to the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the crew that will later become allies in reaching Skypiea.

keyMoments.title: Salvage Competition
keyMoments.description: The Masira Pirates compete with the Straw Hats to salvage items from the St. Briss wreckage underwater.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's salvage expertise and competitive nature.

formationHistory.eventDescription: Masira Pirates introduced as established crew
